title.value: A Reproducible and Realistic Evaluation of Partial Domain Adaptation Methods
title.justification: This is the title of the research paper as specified by the user prompt and the document.
title.quote: A Reproducible and Realistic Evaluation of Partial Domain Adaptation Methods

extractions.description: This paper conducts an in-depth experimental study to evaluate 7 different Partial Domain Adaptation (PDA) methods on 2 real-world datasets under 7 different model selection strategies. It investigates the impact of model selection strategies on the performance of PDA methods and highlights the challenge of selecting optimal models without using target labels.

type.justification: The paper is centered around experiments and evaluations of different methods and model selection strategies, indicating an empirical nature.
type.quote: We conduct extensive experiments to study the impact of model selection strategies on the performance of partial domain adaptation methods.

name.justification: The primary focus is on evaluating methods for domain adaptation using unlabeled target data, as stated in the abstract.
name.quote: Unsupervised Domain Adaptation (UDA) aims at classifying unlabeled target images leveraging source labeled ones... In this work, we consider the Partial Domain Adaptation (PDA) variant...

name.justification: The paper specifically deals with a variant of Unsupervised Domain Adaptation known as Partial Domain Adaptation (PDA).
name.quote: In this work, we consider the Partial Domain Adaptation (PDA) variant, where we have extra source classes not present in the target domain.

name.justification: The paper compares different model selection strategies specifically for Partial Domain Adaptation.
name.quote: We evaluate 7 different PDA methods with 7 different model selection strategies on 2 different datasets under the same experimental protocol for fair comparison.

name.justification: The Source Only model is one of the baseline models evaluated in the study.
name.quote: Methods. We implemented 7 PDA methods by adapting the code from the Official GitHub repositories of each method: Source Only, PADA (Cao et al., 2018)...

is_contributed.justification: The model is used as a baseline for comparison but is not a contribution of this study.
is_contributed.quote: Methods. We implemented 7 PDA methods by adapting the code from the Official GitHub repositories of each method: Source Only, PADA (Cao et al., 2018)...

is_executed.justification: The Source Only model is implemented and tested in the conducted experiments.
is_executed.quote: we chose to implement all methods with the same commonly used neural network architecture, optimizer, learning rate schedule and evaluation protocol.

is_compared.justification: The Source Only model is compared against other PDA methods in terms of accuracy.
is_compared.quote: For some pairs, the drop of performance can be significant, leading some methods to perform on par or worse than the S . ONLY method.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The Source Only model is a baseline and is not tied to a specific reference paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Methods. We implemented 7 PDA methods by adapting the code from the Official GitHub repositories of each method: Source Only

name.justification: PADA is one of the PDA methods evaluated in the study.
name.quote: Methods. We implemented 7 PDA methods by adapting the code from the Official GitHub repositories of each method: Source Only, PADA (Cao et al., 2018)...

is_contributed.justification: PADA is not a contribution of this study but is included as one of the evaluated methods.
is_contributed.quote: Methods. We implemented 7 PDA methods by adapting the code from the Official GitHub repositories of each method: Source Only, PADA (Cao et al., 2018)...

is_executed.justification: The PADA model is implemented and tested in the conducted experiments.
is_executed.quote: we chose to implement all methods with the same commonly used neural network architecture, optimizer, learning rate schedule and evaluation protocol.

is_compared.justification: The PADA model is compared against other PDA methods in terms of accuracy.
is_compared.quote: For some pairs, the drop of performance can be significant, leading some methods to perform on par or worse than the S . ONLY method. That is the case on OFFICE - HOME when DEV is paired with either BA 3 US, JUMBOT and MPOT.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The reference for the PADA model is 'Partial adversarial domain adaptation' by Cao et al.
referenced_paper_title.quote: In Proceedings of the European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV), pp. 135â€“150, 2018.

name.justification: VISDA is one of the datasets used in the study.
name.quote: The second dataset is VISDA (Peng et al., 2017) with synthetic images as source domain and real-world images as target domain.
